resources.string: This is a fishing game where you capture fish using various tools at your disposal. Enter the name of the 2 players and the number of rounds in the boxes below. \nPlayers get 1 turn each in every round where they can move around the fisherman and then fish using one of the 3 tools. The three choices of tools are - a round net, a rectangular net and a spear. The round net can be moved around in a limited area and can capture the closest fish from among the ones it overlaps. The rectangular net is flexible and can be made bigger or smaller. Bigger the net, lesser the probability of catching fish. The spear can be moved and rotated. It has a 100%% chance of capturing every fish it hits. At the end of the game the player with the higher number of captures wins.\n
